name: Arceana Adventures
description:
Created by:

Abu Bangurah- Programmer

Tuan Pham- Programmer

Rachel Yang- Artist/Designer

Arianna Mills- Assets/Designer

Kaitlin Antoun- Programmer/Designer

An interactive fortune telling application that tells your past, present, and future in 3D/AR. 

Notes:

- Download photos in sceneshoots to use AR functionality and press spacebar to show cards meaning when model appears.

- Models based of Jojo's Bizarre Adventure, Persona Series, and Warcraft

- Recommended Screen Size: 1280 x 800

- For History Screen if there's no scrollbar strecth the screen out if windowed.

- AR may or may not work depending on if your playing on browser or not

- AR created with Vuforia
